verses.verse: <S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G4355>accept<s%> the one who is <S%G770>weak<s%> in <S%G4102>faith,<s%> [but] not for [the purpose of] <S%G1253>passing<s%> <S%G1253>judgment<s%> on his <S%G1261>opinions.<s%>

<S%G3739>One<s%> <S%G3303><s%> man <S%G4100>has<s%> <S%G4100>faith<s%> that he may <S%G2068>eat<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>things,<s%> but he who is <S%G770>weak<s%> <S%G2068>eats<s%> <S%G3001>vegetables<s%> [only.]

Let not him who <S%G2068>eats<s%> <S%G1848>regard<s%> with <S%G1848>contempt<s%> him who does not <S%G2068>eat,<s%> and let not him who does not <S%G2068>eat<s%> <S%G2919>judge<s%> him who <S%G2068>eats,<s%> for <S%G2316>God<s%> has <S%G4355>accepted<s%> him.

<S%G5101>Who<s%> are you to <S%G2919>judge<s%> the <S%G3610>servant<s%> of <S%G245>another<s%>? To his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G2962>master<s%> he <S%G4739>stands<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G4098>falls;<s%> and <S%G2476>stand<s%> he will, for the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> is <S%G1414>able<s%> to <S%G2476>make<s%> him <S%G2476>stand.<s%>

<S%G3739>One<s%> <S%G3303><s%> man <S%G2919>regards<s%> one <S%G2250>day<s%> <S%G3844>above<s%> <S%G2250>another,<s%> <S%G3739>another<s%> <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2919>regards<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> [alike.] Let <S%G1538>each<s%> <S%G1538>man<s%> be <S%G4135>fully<s%> <S%G4135>convinced<s%> in his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G3563>mind.<s%>

He who <S%G5426>observes<s%> the <S%G2250>day,<s%> <S%G5426>observes<s%> it for the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> and he who <S%G2068>eats,<s%> <S%G2068>does<s%> <S%G2068>so<s%> for the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> for he <S%G2168>gives<s%> <S%G2168>thanks<s%> to <S%G2316>God;<s%> and he who <S%G2068>eats<s%> not, for the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> he does not <S%G2068>eat,<s%> and <S%G2168>gives<s%> <S%G2168>thanks<s%> to <S%G2316>God.<s%>
For not <S%G3762>one<s%> of us <S%G2198>lives<s%> for <S%G1438>himself,<s%> and not <S%G3762>one<s%> <S%G599>dies<s%> for <S%G1438>himself;<s%>

for <S%G1437>if<s%> we <S%G2198>live,<s%> we <S%G2198>live<s%> for the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G5037>or<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> we <S%G599>die,<s%> we <S%G599>die<s%> for the <S%G2962>Lord;<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G1437>whether<s%> <S%G5037><s%> we <S%G2198>live<s%> <S%G1437>or<s%> <S%G5037><s%> <S%G599>die,<s%> we are the Lord's.

For to <S%G3778>this<s%> end <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G599>died<s%> and <S%G2198>lived<s%> [again], that He might be <S%G2961>Lord<s%> <S%G2532>both<s%> of the <S%G3498>dead<s%> and of the <S%G2198>living.<s%>

But you, <S%G5101>why<s%> do you <S%G2919>judge<s%> your <S%G80>brother<s%>? <S%G2228>Or<s%> you <S%G2532>again,<s%> <S%G5101>why<s%> do you <S%G1848>regard<s%> your <S%G80>brother<s%> with <S%G1848>contempt<s%>? For we shall <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3936>stand<s%> <S%G3936>before<s%> the <S%G968>judgment<s%> <S%G968>seat<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

For it is <S%G1125>written,<s%> "As I <S%G2198>live,<s%> <S%G3004>says<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G1119>knee<s%> shall <S%G2578>bow<s%> to Me, And <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G1100>tongue<s%> shall <S%G1843>give<s%> <S%G1843>praise<s%> to <S%G2316>God.<s%>"
<S%G686>So<s%> <S%G686>then<s%> <S%G1538>each<s%> <S%G1538>one<s%> of us shall <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G3056>account<s%> of <S%G1438>himself<s%> to <S%G2316>God.<s%>

<S%G3767>Therefore<s%> let us not <S%G2919>judge<s%> <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G240>another<s%> <S%G3371>anymore,<s%> but <S%G3123>rather<s%> <S%G2919>determine<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> â€“ not to <S%G5087>put<s%> an <S%G4348>obstacle<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> a <S%G4625>stumbling<s%> <S%G4625>block<s%> in a brother's way.

I <S%G3609>know<s%> and am <S%G3982>convinced<s%> in the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> that <S%G3762>nothing<s%> is <S%G2839>unclean<s%> in <S%G1438>itself;<s%> but to him who <S%G3049>thinks<s%> <S%G5100>anything<s%> to be <S%G2839>unclean,<s%> to him it is <S%G2839>unclean.<s%>

For <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G1223>because<s%> of <S%G1033>food<s%> your <S%G80>brother<s%> is <S%G3076>hurt,<s%> you are <S%G3765>no<s%> <S%G3765>longer<s%> <S%G4043>walking<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to <S%G26>love.<s%> Do not <S%G622>destroy<s%> with your <S%G1033>food<s%> him for <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G599>died.<s%>
<S%G3767>Therefore<s%> do not let <S%G18>what<s%> is for you a <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G18>thing<s%> be <S%G987>spoken<s%> of as <S%G987>evil;<s%>

for the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> is not <S%G1035>eating<s%> and <S%G4213>drinking,<s%> but <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> and <S%G1515>peace<s%> and <S%G5479>joy<s%> in the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit.<s%>
For he who in <S%G3778>this<s%> [way] <S%G1398>serves<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> is <S%G2101>acceptable<s%> to <S%G2316>God<s%> and <S%G1384>approved<s%> by <S%G444>men.<s%>
<S%G686>So<s%> <S%G686>then<s%> let us <S%G1377>pursue<s%> the things which make for <S%G1515>peace<s%> and the <S%G3619>building<s%> up of <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G240>another.<s%>

Do not <S%G2647>tear<s%> <S%G2647>down<s%> the <S%G2041>work<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> for the <S%G1752>sake<s%> of <S%G1033>food.<s%> <S%G3956>All<s%> <S%G3956>things<s%> <S%G3303>indeed<s%> are <S%G2513>clean,<s%> but they are <S%G2556>evil<s%> for the <S%G444>man<s%> who <S%G2068>eats<s%> and <S%G1223>gives<s%> <S%G4348>offense.<s%>

It is <S%G2570>good<s%> not to <S%G2068>eat<s%> <S%G2907>meat<s%> <S%G3366>or<s%> to <S%G4095>drink<s%> <S%G3631>wine,<s%> <S%G3366>or<s%> [to do anything] by <S%G3739>which<s%> your <S%G80>brother<s%> <S%G4350>stumbles.<s%>

The <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> you <S%G2192>have,<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> as your <S%G4572>own<s%> <S%G4572>conviction<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> <S%G2316>God.<s%> <S%G3107>Happy<s%> is he who does not <S%G2919>condemn<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%> in <S%G3739>what<s%> he <S%G1381>approves.<s%>

But he who <S%G1252>doubts<s%> is <S%G2632>condemned<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> he <S%G2068>eats,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> [his eating is] not from <S%G4102>faith;<s%> and <S%G3956>whatever<s%> <S%G3739><s%> is not from <S%G4102>faith<s%> is <S%G266>sin.<s%>
